com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp

Class SparqlEndpointConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.SparqlEndpointConfig

  • public class SparqlEndpointConfig
extends Object
    Configuration object.
    See Also:
    ConfigParams

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean describeEachNamedGraph
      When true and the KB instance is in the quads mode, each named graph will also be described in in the same level of detail as the default graph.
      String namespace
      The default namespace.
      int queryThreadPoolSize
      The #of threads to use to handle SPARQL queries -or- ZERO (0) for an unbounded pool.
      long queryTimeout
      When non-zero, this specifies the timeout (milliseconds) for a query.
      boolean readOnly
      When true, requests will be refused for mutation operations on the database made through the REST API.
      long timestamp
      The default timestamp used to query the default namespace.

    • Field Detail

      • namespace

        public final String namespace
        The default namespace.
        See Also:
        ConfigParams.NAMESPACE

      • timestamp

        public final long timestamp
        The default timestamp used to query the default namespace. The server will obtain a read only transaction which reads from the commit point associated with this timestamp.

        Note: When ConfigParams.READ_LOCK is specified, the timestamp will actually be a read-only transaction identifier which is shared by default for each query against the NanoSparqlServer.

        See Also:
        ConfigParams.READ_LOCK

      • queryThreadPoolSize

        public final int queryThreadPoolSize
        The #of threads to use to handle SPARQL queries -or- ZERO (0) for an unbounded pool.
        See Also:
        ConfigParams.QUERY_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

      • describeEachNamedGraph

        public final boolean describeEachNamedGraph
        When true and the KB instance is in the quads mode, each named graph will also be described in in the same level of detail as the default graph. Otherwise only the default graph will be described.
        See Also:
        ConfigParams.DESCRIBE_EACH_NAMED_GRAPH

      • readOnly

        public final boolean readOnly
        When true, requests will be refused for mutation operations on the database made through the REST API. This may be used to help lock down a public facing interface.
        See Also:
        ConfigParams.READ_ONLY

      • queryTimeout

        public final long queryTimeout
        When non-zero, this specifies the timeout (milliseconds) for a query. This may be used to limit resource consumption on a public facing interface.
        See Also:
        ConfigParams.QUERY_TIMEOUT

    • Constructor Detail

      • SparqlEndpointConfig

        public SparqlEndpointConfig(String namespace,
                    long timestamp,
                    int queryThreadPoolSize,
                    boolean describeEachNamedGraph,
                    boolean readOnly,
                    long queryTimeout)
